text: This is a list of banks in Laos. == Central bank == * Bank of the Lao P.D.R. == Local banks == * Banque pour le Commerce Exterieur Lao (BCEL) * Lao Development Bank * Indochina Bank * Joint Development Bank * Phongsavanh Bank (https://www.phongsavanhbank.com/psv/index.php) * ST Bank * Lao-Viet Bank * Maruhan Japan Bank Lao *Agriculture Promotion Bank * BIC Bank == Foreign banks == * ACLEDA BANK * ANZ Laos * Krung Thai Bank * Public Bank Laos Banks Banks * Laos
title: List of banks in Laos
